42 #include "Teuchos_TableColumn.hpp"
43 
44 using namespace Teuchos;
45 
46 
47 TableColumn::TableColumn(const Array<std::string>& vals)
48  : data_(vals.size())
49 {
50  for (Array<std::string>::size_type i=0; i<vals.size(); i++)
51  {
52  data_[i] = rcp(new StringEntry(vals[i]));
53  }
54 }
55 
56 
57 TableColumn::TableColumn(const Array<double>& vals,
58  int precision)
59  : data_(vals.size())
60 {
61  for (Array<double>::size_type i=0; i<vals.size(); i++)
62  {
63  data_[i] = rcp(new DoubleEntry(vals[i], precision));
64  }
65 }
66 
67 
68 TableColumn::TableColumn(const Array<double>& first,
69  const Array<double>& second,
70  int precision,
71  bool spaceBeforeParentheses)
72  : data_(first.size())
73 {
74  for (Array<double>::size_type i=0; i<first.size(); i++)
75  {
76  RCP<DoubleEntry> x1 = rcp(new DoubleEntry(first[i], precision));
77  RCP<DoubleEntry> x2 = rcp(new DoubleEntry(second[i], precision));
78  data_[i]
79  = rcp(new CompoundEntryWithParentheses(x1, x2,
80  spaceBeforeParentheses));
81  }
82 }
83 
84 void TableColumn::addEntry(const RCP<TableEntry>& entry_in)
85 {
86  data_.append(entry_in);
87 }
